disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Organic Deconstruction.

blurb.value: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

description.value: Innate: Vel'Koz's abilities apply a Deconstruction stack for 7 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks refresh the duration on-hit.

description2.value: The third stack consumes them all, dealing 33 − 169 (based on level) (+ 50% AP)  bonus true damage.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Plasma Fission.

blurb.value: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.

description.value: Active: Vel'Koz fires a plasma bolt in the target direction that collides with the first enemy hit to deal them magic damage and slow them by 70% for a few seconds, decaying over the duration. Plasma Fission can be recast after 0.25 seconds.

description2.value: At the end of its range or upon colliding with an enemy, the bolt splits in half, each part firing in opposite directions perpendicular to the primary bolt's trajectory, both dealing the same damage and applying the same slow to the first enemy they collide with.

description3.value: Recast: Vel'Koz splits Plasma Fission early.

description4.value: Plasma Fission restores  mana per target killed.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Detonating the ability manually does not. An enemy cannot be hit by multiple bolts even when having blocked one with a spell shield. Plasma Fission can travel a maximum ~1521 units diagonally. Plasma Fission will cast from wherever Vel'Koz is at the end of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Void Rift.

blurb.value: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.

description.value: Passive: Vel'Koz periodically stocks a Void Rift charge, up to a maximum of 2.

description2.value: Active: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that cuts through the ground in a line in the target direction over 1 second, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and leaving behind a trail.

description3.value: After 0.75 seconds, the trail detonates, dealing magic damage to enemies within.

leveling3.value: Detonation Magic Damage:»45 / 75 / 105 / 135 / 165 (+ 25% AP)«Total Damage:75 / 125 / 175 / 225 / 275 (+ 40% AP)

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Unbreakable and Wind Wall will block the rift from forming over them, but they will not destroy the trail that was created before it. Spell shield only blocks one instance of damage.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Tectonic Disruption.

blurb.value: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

description.value: Active: Vel'Koz hurls a disruptive anomaly that reaches the target location after 0.75 seconds, briefly providing sight, dealing magic damage and knocking up and stunning enemies in the area for 0.75 seconds. If the area is created close to Vel'Koz, enemies hit are also slightly knocked back in the direction of the cast.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The required proximity for the knock back is relative to Vel'Koz's position when casting and not his current one. Although considered to be a projectile, Unbreakable and Wind Wall will block Tectonic Disruption, but will not destroy it visually.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Life Form Disintegration Ray.

blurb.value: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.

description.value: Passive - Researched: Deconstructing enemy champions marks them as Researched for 7 seconds. Basic attacks on-hit and ability hits refresh the duration.

description2.value: Active: After a 0.2-second delay, Vel'Koz reveals himself and channels for 2.6 seconds to project an energy beam in a line. The ray's trajectory updates itself over the duration to face the target direction. After 1 second, Life Form Disintegration Ray can be recast.

description3.value: The ray deals magic damage to enemies within in 0.2-second intervals, and slows them by 20%, lingering for 1 second. Deconstruction is applied every 0.7 seconds to enemies hit. Researched enemies take true damage instead.

description4.value: Recast: Vel'Koz ends Life Form Disintegration Ray early.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

damagetype.value: Magic / True

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Life Form Disintegration Ray's trajectory updates gradually (moving the cursor from one side of Vel'Koz to the other will not make him rotate instantly). The beam covers Vel'Koz's hitbox, damaging enemies standing close. The following table refers for interactions while Vel'Koz is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Disabled Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by All item-actives not specified above interrupt Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled Flash Hexflash Interrupted by Teleport Recall Interrupted by Death Silencing effects
